markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fully Flighted](/Feats.aspx?ID=2657) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Juvenile Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2653)

</column>

---

You can take to the skies at any time. You have a fly Speed of 25 feet at all times.

**Special** You can take this feat a second time. If you do, your fly Speed increases to 35 feet.
name: Fully Flighted
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Juvenile Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2653)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.
</summary>
summary: You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.
summary_markdown: You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.
